name: The light in the darkness (itch)
description:
The Light in the dark is not a game for anyone, you need to be brave and especially, do not be afraid of the Dark. You will only have one life, if you get lost around the beginning. So if you are not prepared for this challenge, do not play, but if you are one of the best, I challenge you to leave the world !!!!!!

The character finds himself in a dark world where he knows nothing about this place, but has a flashlight waiting for you to release him from this dark and gloomy world.

Game mode: To walk use W, S, A, D, to jump use SPACE and the mouse to aim ...

In this game you need to collect 22 keys to be able to leave this dark place and be able to see the light again, but .... be very careful, because any slip can be fatal !!!!
